pageContext.claim: “You have chain migration. You know what that is? A guy comes in — stone-cold killer in many cases. A guy comes in, and then you have to bring his aunt, his uncle, his father, his grandfather, his grandparents, his third niece by a different marriage.”
pageContext.analysis: Studies show that legal immigrants commit crime at lower rates than native-born Americans. In any case, a convicted killer would be denied entry.
